nodes.text: The Mark VI Powersuit was a powersuit developed by Telgorn Corporation. The suit was designed to be the end-all be-all powersuit and was specialized for all harsh environments. Its most well known uses were with military organizations, rescue missions, and scientific research. The suit was equipped with a unique and powerful blaster cannon with a specialized focusing lens. The powerful suit also utilized an advanced life support system and a Ubrikkian repulsorlift engine.
